summary: Consume Phantombuster API to perform various operations like deleting agents, getting agent details, launching agents, and more.

parameters.name: resource
parameters.description: Select the type of resource to interact with (e.g., Agent or Custom API Call).

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Choose the operation to perform on the selected resource (e.g., Delete, Get, Get Many, Launch).

parameters.name: agent name or id
parameters.description: Choose an agent from the list or specify an ID using an expression.

parameters.name: agent id
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the agent.

parameters.name: return all
parameters.description: Specify whether to return all results or only up to a given limit.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Specify the maximum number of results to return.

parameters.name: resolve data
parameters.description: Automatically resolve the output data if activated.

parameters.name: additional fields
parameters.description: Additional fields to configure for specific operations.
